mapper.select: select * from review_db order by rev_idx desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into notice_db(n_chk, n_opt, a_idx, n_tle, n_con, n_dat, n_out, n_hit, f_name) value (#{n_chk}, #{n_opt}, #{a_idx}, #{n_tle}, #{n_con}, now(), #{n_out}, 0, #{f_name})
mapper.update: update notice_db set n_hit = n_hit + 1 where idxn_idx = #{idxn_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into comment_db(u_idx, c_con, c_dat, c_up, c_out, c_bor, c_ref) values (#{u_idx}, #{c_con}, now(), #{c_up}, #{c_out}, #{c_bor}, #{c_ref})
mapper.update: update comment_db set c_out = 1 where c_idx = #{c_idx}

update notice_db set n_chk = #{n_chk}, n_opt = #{n_opt}, n_tle = #{n_tle}, n_con = #{n_con}, f_name = #{f_name}
where n_idx = #{n_idx}
